title: smariso sarvada
sahitya:
smariso sarvada hariya


anupallavi

  suravara doreya karuNAnidhiya


caraNam 1    munijana vandyana manasijanayyana manadali anudina neneyo hariya
    caraNam 2    nandana kandana indireyarasana mantrOddharana candadindali hariya
    caraNam 3    vara guNa pURNana sarasija nEtrana paravAsudEvana prANada priyana
    caraNam 4    kanjadaLEkSaNa manjuLa hArana arjuna sArathi sajjana priyana
    caraNam 5    vEnkaTaramaNana sankaTa haraNana lakSmIramaNana purandara viTTalana
